release_note: Neue Flashbacks: Get a look at your weeks from years past with brand new flashbacks. Relive moments and enjoy the memories that shaped your week. You can create memories with photos from your gallery or simply reflect on the great moments of the past years. Modern Stats: Memoly s statistics have been given a fresh design and now include even more information for your counters. Track your progress with additional statistics and stay on top of your goals. Improved Apple Health data import: The import of Apple Health data for Counter has been optimized and is now even more reliable. Seamlessly connect to your health data and rely on accurate information. New Counter Type: Climbing Stairs: A new counter type for Apple Health integration: Stair Climbing. Record your activities even more precisely and track how many stairs you have climbed. Daily Reminder: Never miss a check in again! Now receive daily reminders to keep an eye on your counters and make sure you re tracking all your activity. Database migration and duplicate reminders: If duplicate reminders appear during the database migration you can easily have them removed by Memoly. Optimized for iPad: Further improvements implemented for an optimal experience on larger screens.

I m very excited to introduce the latest update that brings a powerful new feature to Memoly: Counter! Because I know how important it is to develop positive habits and monitor progress I introduced these versatile counters to help you achieve your goals effectively. With Memoly s new counters you can effortlessly track different aspects of your life and maintain a productive and fulfilling routine. Easily build good habits or give up bad ones: Whether you re pursuing fitness goals tracking your daily water intake or simply keeping track of your achievements. The new counters support you on your way. With the help of these intuitive counters you can create positive habits or say goodbye to the ones you want to leave behind. Widgets and more: To ensure seamless integration into your daily life I have equipped the counters with a variety of practical functions. The counters will come with widgets lock screen widgets shortcuts and Spotlight support. This allows you to track your habits and progress from different points on your device and update them quickly and easily when necessary. Your reliable companion: Memoly s counters are not just tools but also your reliable companions on the path to personal growth and success. Whether you re striving for consistency improving or celebrating success these counters will keep you on track and motivate you every step of the way. Take advantage of this update harness the power of Counters and let them guide you to a more organized and fulfilling life. Achieve your goals one step at a time with Memoly by your side. Improvements: In addition to the new counters Memoly s structure has been completely renewed. The iPhone app now works based on the latest technology and the iPad app is now clearer and more powerful. There are also new widgets for Memoly. Stats widgets have been removed but will return soon. In addition some errors and bugs have been fixed.
Add timestamps to your text Support for Markdown Improved link preview Multiple locations per memory with revamped choices

Updated Pricing: Memoly is now more affordable and gives more users access to additional features and benefits. Various bugs have been fixed and the overall stability of the app has been improved to ensure a smoother and more reliable user experience. Improved performance and optimized memory usage for greater efficiency.
Memoly now also supports Spotify. Connect your Spotify account to Memoly and add your currently playing song directly to a new reminder.
Music is part of memories! Connect your Apple Music account to Memoly to add your currently playing song directly to a new reminder.

Sometimes you don t know how you feel or have felt. It can sometimes be difficult to choose the right feeling for a memory. With this update this problem is now a thing of the past. You can now create memories without feeling. Plus your calendar is now much more responsive and reliable than ever before.
Bug fixes and various adjustments
You can now add multiple photos to a memory at once Memoly Share can now use your name Memoly Share now sends all photos of a memory not just one Quick Note support for the iPad
You can now unleash your creativity add a canvas to your memories that you can design however you want Various improvements

Use your voice! Using voice notes makes it easier and quicker to summarize your day. Also new: An improved search that uses tags. You can easily add tags in text using and search for them later. This is how you can always find your best memories. Bug fixes and improvements Improvements for devices running iOS 15
A bug has been fixed so that reminders can now be created from the calendar again.
Fixed a bug that could cause the calendar to not work properly

A new way to suggest ideas and improvements You can now see the roadmap with all future ideas directly in the app It is now easier to save memories as Core Memories You can summarize your day in more depth with questions that are asked to you per reminder in a chat . You can now edit existing actions The new ChatGPT integration can help you write better and longer texts for your memories.
You can now send feedback directly from the app to Memoly. To do this go to Settings and go to the Help section. There you will find a feedback button.
Fixed an issue where the Reminders view was blank due to a missing configuration Fixed an issue where the preview of a reminder was still filled with old data
Be reminded to take photos as soon as you leave a location Thanks to everyone who supported me in making the app the way it is now. In the settings under thanks you can find everyone who helped me

Fixed a bug where suggested photos were not displayed Small bug fixes and improvements Due to bugs and feedback from the community the bulleted list has been removed. You still have the option of creating a list manually

Neuer Memoly Pro Store Manage your subscription directly in the app Back up your memories buckets and all saved things Export and import backups to save to your device or upload to any cloud storage provider A new post chart for Memoly Pro users Memoly Pro users can now add their quote of the day to a reminder Get metadata for your memories Share your reminder text via Twitter or your pictures via Instagram Stories

The bug that caused the app to crash when trying to save a reminder from Memoly Share. You can now request help by email directly in the app. Memoly Share connections are now encrypted. Small improvements.

The new Memoly Share feature lets you share your memories with devices near you. You can choose whether you want to receive or send data. In addition you can set in the settings how Memoly Share should add reminders and which data can be shared with other users.
Get ready for the new Memoly Recap 2022! With this update you can let Memoly summarize your year by highlighting your most memorable moments.

This update contains small improvements and changes. The Design tab in Settings is back. There are alternative app icons again. You can now determine the appearance of the app yourself again. The notifications have been updated.

In a distant land where people s memories were stored in a magical app there was a new update. The country s residents were now able to export their memories as a PDF text or Markdown file to preserve them forever. Additionally there were new widgets that looked like magic wands and showed statistics about how many memories were created in the last few days and months. The country s residents were excited by the new possibilities and spent many hours exporting their memories and observing the statistics. The update was a blessing for the country and everyone was happy and content.
Use the map to get an overview of all added locations. Performance improvements in statistics. Some statistics weren t quite right yet but they should be now.
Update in the What s New menu in Settings. The missing text in the statistics is now available. A description has now been added to the example bucket. The trophy graph is now updated correctly.

Added statistics to Memoly. Overview of the last 7 days Overview of the last 14 days Overview of the last month Overview of the last six months Overview of the last year Overview of all reminders created per month Overview of the memories created Overview of words and characters Overview of the month with the most least reminders Overview of your emotional state while using Memoly Overview of the overall use of feelings Overview of the most least used feelings Overview of the actions used Overview of overall promotion usage Overview of the most least used actions A new way to view your memories: The All Memories tab has been redesigned to provide quick access to all memories this year s this month s and current day s memories. Reminder URL scheme support. Bug fixes: Fixed a bug that prevented you from being able to open a memory when a flashback is displayed Removed Grid View for iPhone and iPad as it was full of errors. Perfomance: Improved performance when tapping All Reminders
Big fixes. Changes to links to the website. Design changes in the What s new Tab in Settings.
Links and settings have been updated to work with the new website.
Focus Filter: Memoly now supports focus filters which you can use to view your core memories after activating a focus mode.
Bug fixes and small improvements. Support for in app purchases directly from the AppStore.

You can now collect even more trophies by completing certain tasks in the app. A complete list of all available trophies can be found here: You can now have a bucket created as an example if you want to find out what you can do with buckets. The theme settings have been removed. You can now create reminders more easily. To do this tap one of the suggested photos on the home screen or take a new photo. You can now also create tasks for your buckets in the Shortcuts app. The missing icon for buckets under iOS 15 has been replaced.

Buckets: Create buckets to plan trips or vacations. Create tasks and complete them along with your reminders. Add reminders to your buckets so you always remember them. Tasks can be added to your reminders and will be completed when completed in the Reminders app. Stay on top of your buckets progress with new live widgets and dynamic island support iPhone 14 Pro iPhone 14 Pro Max only . All changes: Create buckets to plan trips. Live widgets and Dynamic Island support to track your bucket tasks. Add unlimited buckets with Memoly Pro. Fixed link preview background issues. Fixed an issue that could cause a crash when creating a reminder from the Shortcuts app. URL scheme support. Performance improvements. Apple Watch support for buckets.

The change view for changing calendar events is now completely displayed without the bottom row. The integration of reminders is now blocked without Memoly Pro. Select an image as a thumbnail for a reminder. Some UI feedback to guide the user through changes in the app. Add warnings to confirm deletion of a memory. Create and edit events directly in the app. Select an image from your storage to use as a preview image. Haptic feedback for specific actions.

Memoly Version 1.2 brings integrations and thus ensures better integration into the iOS ecosystem. View workouts tasks or events that you experienced throughout the day. All information in one place. This version includes integrations that make creating reminders easier. Integrations help you pack more information into your memories. Integrations enable the automatic collection of data that would otherwise require laborious work to collect. Integrations are interfaces between Memoly and Apple services third party providers may soon be possible and show you different information or help you create reminders more easily and quickly. Use the Activity Workout integration to automatically integrate your activity and training sessions into your memory. Use the reminder integrations to add your open and completed tasks to your reminder. Use the calendar integration to include your completed and upcoming events in your reminder. requires an active subscription to Memoly Pro
This version includes small improvements and bug fixes. The English translation for setting the link preview size has been adjusted. Translations for authorization messages have been adjusted.

This version includes some improvements to the text editor for creating reminders. Design your text with the following elements: Fetter Text Italic Text Strikethrough text Insert links in the text Listen Lists Quotes This version also includes improvements and changes to the link preview. Feel free to send feedback to timo memolyapp.de or at https: memolyapp.de de feedback.
Small improvements and bug fixes.
